title: Learner-Centered Online Program for Developing Medical Research Competencies

context.additional_context: Corporate social responsibility program to enhance medical research capabilities, with personalized assignments based on learners’ research experience and interests.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically execute a research process from topic selection to final reporting within an 8-week period

Learners collaborate with a mentor and two peers using LMS platform tools (Slack, Google Workspace, etc.) to host monthly research topic presentations, incorporating at least 80% of feedback into an improved research report.
Learners can incorporate feedback into their research process to produce and present a final research report
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
